MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 成員指定相對的資料流程方向的列舉。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.

value.span: 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的文字方向。

span.span: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.

value.span: 設定這個屬性會導致的內容重新指定方向流程的項目。

span.span: Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字方向的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文提供由右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英文、 德文與俄文提供由左到右的語言的範例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. **注意：** 這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。**Note:** The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您需要使用不同的值，則預設值是，您必須指定它自己。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_flowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_flowdirection)]

summary.span: Gets the next element that is a peer to this element.

span.span: Gets the next element that is a peer to this element.

value.span: 物件，表示下一個至這個項目，對等項目或 * * null * * 如果沒有任何下一步項目。

span.span: An object representing the next element that is a peer to this element, or **null** if there is no next element.
This property has no default value.

value.span: 物件，代表先前至這個項目，對等項目或 * * null * * 如果沒有先前項目。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SiblingInlines As InlineCollection

summary.span: Gets an that contains the elements that are siblings (peers) to this element.

span.span: Gets an that contains the elements that are siblings (peers) to this element.

value.span: 物件，其中包含至這個項目同層級項目。

span.span: An object that contains the elements that are siblings to this element.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一律傳回這個屬性的集合包含所要求集合的項目。The collection returned by this property always contains the element through which the collection is requested. 也就是說，內嵌項目會被視為自己的同層級，用於建置的同層級項目的集合。That is, an inline element is considered to be its own sibling for the purpose of building a collection of siblings for the element. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_SiblingBase](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_siblingbase)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_SiblingBase](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_siblingbase)] [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_Siblings](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_siblings)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_Siblings](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_siblings)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ TextDecorations { System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ value); };
member this.TextDecorations : System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection with get, set

summary.span: Gets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

span.span: Gets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: A集合，其中包含要套用至這個項目文字裝飾。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 預設值是 * * null * * （套用任何文字裝飾）。

span.span: The default value is **null** (no text decorations applied).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是視覺裝飾，您可以加入文字。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 文字裝飾的四種類型： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_textdecxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何**頂線**，**基準**，和**底線**分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the **Overline**, **Baseline**, and **Underline** decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 預設文字基準影響](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準上文字的效果")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_textdec)]
